gov.lanl.adore.djatoka
Class DjatokaEncodeParam

java.lang.Object
  gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.DjatokaEncodeParam
All Implemented Interfaces:
DjatokaConstants
public class DjatokaEncodeParam
extends java.lang.Object
implements DjatokaConstants

Encode Parameters for djatoka compression. Defines compression parameters (i.e. levels, slope, layers, etc.) to be performed during extraction of JP2.

Author:
Ryan Chute

setPrecincts

public void setPrecincts(java.lang.String precincts)
Sets the size of the layer packets. Default values improved random access performance. Format: "{256,256},{256,256},{128,128}"

Parameters:
precincts - the size of the layer packets.
